remarks: An element of zero order generates an infinite subgroup.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 12-Sep-2015.)
statement:
odhash.x $e |- X = ( Base ` G ) $.
odhash.o $e |- O = ( od ` G ) $.
odhash.k $e |- K = ( mrCls ` ( SubGrp ` G ) ) $.
odhash $p |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ A e. X /\ ( O ` A ) = 0 ) -> ( # ` ( K ` { A } ) ) = +oo ) $.
